actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: A bill to establish the Wasatch National Recreation Area in the State of Utah, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Establishes the Wasatch National Recreation Area within the Wasatch-Cache and Uinta National Forests in Utah. Requires the Secretary of Agriculture to permit hunting and fishing on lands and waters within the recreation area.

titles.title: A bill to establish the Wasatch National Recreation Area in the State of Utah, and for other purposes.
